item.title: The Psychology of Money
item.description: Money plays a vital in everyone’s life and I wanted to understand the concepts around it and how it impacts our lives. In this blog post I will write all my notes & take aways from each chapter of the book. No one’s crazy The difference I noticed frequently is the choices I make and the way I think to spend, save money is totally different when compared to my friends and others.

item.title: Let's Talk Money
item.description: From a young age, I was confused with the value provided by the money. When I was 7-8 years old I remember buying a 5 rupees dairy milk chocolate. As the time passed the chocolate I bought started becoming smaller & smaller. I am no way happy with the size of the chocolate and the thought in my mind was haunting me I gave the same 5 rupees and now the size of chocolate is half the size I bought first time.
